member.summary: Settings of exchange emulator.

member.name: M:StockSharp.Algo.Testing.MarketEmulatorSettings.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the .

member.name: P:StockSharp.Algo.Testing.MarketEmulatorSettings.MatchOnTouch
member.summary: At emulation of clearing by trades, to perform clearing of orders, when trade price touches the order price (is equal to order price), rather than only when the trade price is better than order price. Is On by default (optimistic scenario).

member.name: P:StockSharp.Algo.Testing.MarketEmulatorSettings.DepthExpirationTime
member.summary: The maximal time, during which the order book is in the emulator, If no renewal during this time, the order book is deleted, This feature may be used to remove old order books if the are holes in data. By default is equal to 1 day.

member.name: P:StockSharp.Algo.Testing.MarketEmulatorSettings.Failing
member.summary: The percentage value of new orders registration error. The value may be from 0 (not a single error) to 100. By default is Off.

member.name: P:StockSharp.Algo.Testing.MarketEmulatorSettings.Latency
member.summary: The minimal value of the registered orders delay. By default, it is , which means instant adoption of registered orders by exchange.

member.name: P:StockSharp.Algo.Testing.MarketEmulatorSettings.IsSupportAtomicReRegister
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the re-registration orders as a single transaction. By default is enabled.

member.name: P:StockSharp.Algo.Testing.MarketEmulatorSettings.BufferTime
member.summary: Responses shall be sent in intervals by whole package. The network delay and bufferized operation of exchange are emulated. The default is 0 ms.

member.name: P:StockSharp.Algo.Testing.MarketEmulatorSettings.InitialOrderId
member.summary: The number, starting at which the emulator will generate identifiers for orders .

member.name: P:StockSharp.Algo.Testing.MarketEmulatorSettings.InitialTradeId
member.summary: The number, starting at which the emulator will generate identifiers fir trades .

member.name: P:StockSharp.Algo.Testing.MarketEmulatorSettings.InitialTransactionId
member.summary: The number, starting at which the emulator will generate numbers for order trades .

member.name: P:StockSharp.Algo.Testing.MarketEmulatorSettings.SpreadSize
member.summary: The size of spread in price increments. It used at determination of spread for generation of order book from tick trades. By default equals to 2.

member.name: P:StockSharp.Algo.Testing.MarketEmulatorSettings.MaxDepth
member.summary: The maximal depth of order book, which will be generated from ticks. It used, if there is no order book history. By default equals to 5.

member.name: P:StockSharp.Algo.Testing.MarketEmulatorSettings.VolumeMultiplier
member.summary: The number of volume increments, at which the order exceeds the tick trade. It used at testing on tick trades. By default equals to 2.

member.name: P:StockSharp.Algo.Testing.MarketEmulatorSettings.PortfolioRecalcInterval
member.summary: The interval for recalculation of data on portfolios. If interval equals , recalculation is not performed.

member.name: P:StockSharp.Algo.Testing.MarketEmulatorSettings.ConvertTime
member.summary: To convert time for orders and trades into exchange time. By default, it is disabled.

member.name: P:StockSharp.Algo.Testing.MarketEmulatorSettings.TimeZone
member.summary: Information about the time zone where the exchange is located.

member.name: P:StockSharp.Algo.Testing.MarketEmulatorSettings.PriceLimitOffset
member.summary: The price shift from the previous trade, determining boundaries of maximal and minimal prices for the next session. Used only if there is no saved information . By default, it equals to 40%.

member.name: P:StockSharp.Algo.Testing.MarketEmulatorSettings.IncreaseDepthVolume
member.summary: To add the additional volume into order book at registering orders with greater volume. By default, it is enabled.

member.summary: To save the state of paper trading parameters.

member.summary: To load the state of paper trading parameters.
